title: Kagiyama Yuma, curling, biathlon, and speed skating from Lausanne 2020
description: We've packed as many sports into today's episode. There are updates from curling, biathlon, speed skaitng and alpine skiing. Plus, men's figure skating champion Kagiyama Yuma stopped by to give his reaction.
itunes:title: Kagiyama Yuma, curling, biathlon, and speed skating from Lausanne 2020
